import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { readDeck } from "../utils/api" export default function DisplayDeck() { const [displayDeck, setDisplayDeck] = useState([]) const { deckId } = useParams() // useEffect(() => { // const abortController = new AbortController() // listDecks().then(decks => { // return decks.find(d => d.id === parseInt(deckId)) // }) // .then(deck => { // readDeck(deck.id).then(setDisplayDeck) // }) // return () => abortController.abort() // }, [deckId]) useEffect(() => { const abortController = new AbortController() readDeck(deckId, abortController.signal).then(setDisplayDeck) return () => abortController.abort() }, [deckId]) console.log(displayDeck.name) const cardList = displayDeck && displayDeck.cards const validCards = cardList && cardList.filter(card => !card.cards) console.log(displayDeck.name) const validCardList = validCards && validCards.map(card => (

{card.front}

{card.back}


)) return (
  1. Home
  2. {displayDeck.name}

{displayDeck.name}

{displayDeck.description}


Cards

{validCardList}
) }
